lead_paragraph: Nathan (Ryan Donowho), an anthropology student, invites a few of his classmates and their professor (Stephen Dorff) to his family's abandoned ranch - once a sacred Chumash burial ground - to recreate an ancient ceremony. There they meet Nathan’s psy
